references: N. J. A. Sloane and Simon Plouffe, The Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences, Academic Press, 1995 (includes this sequence).
links: Vincenzo Librandi, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..200
formula: a(n) = sum(k=1..n, sum(i=0..k, (-1)^(n+i-1)*(k-2*i)^n * binomial(k,i)) /(k*2^k)). [_Vladimir Kruchinin_, Apr 20 2011]a(n) ~ (-1)^(n+1) * (n-1)! / (log(1+sqrt(2)))^n. - _Vaclav Kotesovec_, Feb 16 2015
mathematica: With[{nn = 201}, CoefficientList[Series[Log[1 + Sinh[x]], {x, 0, nn}], x] Range[0, nn]!] (* _Vincenzo Librandi_, Apr 11 2014 *)
author: _R. H. Hardin_, _Simon Plouffe_
extensions: Mathematica code replaced by _Vincenzo Librandi_, Apr 11 2014
